description: Get Table Row Count Difference Between Source and Target Databases
body:
/* =============================================================================================================================================================
-- Server		: LOCAL SERVER
-- Database		: @ReferSourceDatabase[Source Database]
-- Script		: GetRowCountDifference_MergeData
-- Description	: Get Table Row Count Difference Between Source and Target Databases
-- Usage		: Execute in [Source Database] to Get Row Count Differences along with Generating Statements to Merge Data btwn Source and Target and ViceVersa
-- Applicable For All below Table Types:
--  Table Contains All Columns as PrimaryKey Columns Only (i.e., No Other Columns Except PK Columns)
--  Table Contains PrimaryKey Columns Along with Other Columns
--  Table Contains All Columns as PrimaryKey Columns in which One of the PrimaryKey Column is an IdentityKey Column (i.e., No Other Columns Except PK and ID Columns)
--  Table Contains PrimaryKey Columns in which One of the PrimaryKey Column is an IdentityKey Column Along with Other Columns
--  Table Contains All Columns with Both Exclusive PrimaryKey Columns and Exclusive IdentityKey Column (i.e., No Other Columns Except PK and ID Columns)
--  Table Contains Both Exclusive PrimaryKey Columns and Exclusive IdentityKey Column Along with Other Columns
-- *Table Contains No PrimaryKey Columns But has IdentityKey Column Only (i.e., No Other Columns Except ID Column) --Invalid Table
--  Table Contains No PrimaryKey Columns But has IdentityKey Column Along with Other Columns
-- *Table DoesNot Contain Both PrimaryKey Columns and IdentityKey Column (i.e, Just like Heap and might not be Heap if clustered Index is Created)
============================================================================================================================================================= */
USE [$SourceDatabase$];
GO
--
DECLARE @ReferSourceDatabase VARCHAR(128) = '$SourceDatabase$';	--Source Database
DECLARE @CheckTargetDatabase VARCHAR(128) = '$TargetDatabase$';	--Target Database
DECLARE @SchemaName VARCHAR(128) = NULL;	--Optional
DECLARE @TableName VARCHAR(128) = NULL;		--Optional
DECLARE @LinkedServer VARCHAR(128) = $LinkedServer$;	--Optional
--
DECLARE --To Include/Exclude Statements for Insert, Update, Delete in Merge Statements
	@IncludeInsert BIT = 1, -- 1 = Included (Default) | 0 = Excluded
	@IncludeUpdate BIT = 1, -- 1 = Included (Default) | 0 = Excluded
	@IncludeDelete BIT = 1; -- 1 = Included (Default) | 0 = Excluded
--
DECLARE @Debug BIT = 0; -- 0 = Excluded (Default) | 1 = Included DeBug Statements -- Use if Checking For Single Table
/* ===== ** DO NOT CHANGE CODE BELOW FROM HERE ** =========================================================================================================== */
IF DB_NAME() <> @ReferSourceDatabase
BEGIN
	RAISERROR('Script Should Only be Executed in @ReferSourceDatabase - Aborting....!', 16, 1) WITH NOWAIT;
	RETURN;
END;
--
SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @SQLcmd NVARCHAR(MAX), @ErrMsg NVARCHAR(MAX);
--
--$BeginRegion: Get TableList from @ReferSourceDatabase UNION @CheckTargetDatabase
DECLARE @TableList TABLE (SCHname VARCHAR(128) NULL, TBLname VARCHAR(128) NULL);
SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT T1.TABLE_SCHEMA, T1.TABLE_NAME FROM [' + @@SERVERNAME + '].[' + @ReferSourceDatabase + '].INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES AS T1 ' + CHAR(10)
			+ N'WHERE T1.TABLE_TYPE = ''BASE TABLE'''
				+ CASE WHEN @SchemaName IS NOT NULL THEN ' AND T1.TABLE_SCHEMA LIKE ''%' + @SchemaName + '%''' ELSE '' END
				+ CASE WHEN @TableName IS NOT NULL THEN ' AND T1.TABLE_NAME LIKE ''%' + @TableName + '%''' ELSE '' END + CHAR(10)
			+ N'UNION ' + CHAR(10)
			+ N'SELECT T2.TABLE_SCHEMA, T2.TABLE_NAME FROM [' + ISNULL(@LinkedServer, @@SERVERNAME) + '].[' + @CheckTargetDatabase + '].INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES AS T2 ' + CHAR(10)
			+ N'WHERE T2.TABLE_TYPE = ''BASE TABLE'''
				+ CASE WHEN @SchemaName IS NOT NULL THEN ' AND T2.TABLE_SCHEMA LIKE ''%' + @SchemaName + '%''' ELSE '' END
				+ CASE WHEN @TableName IS NOT NULL THEN ' AND T2.TABLE_NAME LIKE ''%' + @TableName + '%''' ELSE '' END
			+ N';';
IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--Get TableList from @ReferSourceDatabase UNION @CheckTargetDatabase:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
INSERT INTO @TableList (SCHname, TBLname)
EXECUTE sys.sp_executesql @Command = @SQLcmd;
IF @Debug = 1 SELECT * FROM @TableList;
--$EndRegion: Get TableList from @ReferSourceDatabase UNION @CheckTargetDatabase
--
--$BeginRegion: PreRequisites
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#COMPARISONTABLE', 'U') IS NOT NULL
	DROP TABLE #COMPARISONTABLE;
--
CREATE TABLE #COMPARISONTABLE
(
	SchemaName VARCHAR(128) NULL, TableName VARCHAR(128) NULL,
	SourceRowCount INT NULL, TargetRowCount INT NULL, RowsDEL INT NULL, RowsINS INT NULL, RowsUPD INT NULL,
	ValidateQueryV1 VARCHAR(MAX) NULL,	--Most Preferred to Check RowsINS or RowsDEL
	ValidateQueryV2 VARCHAR(MAX) NULL,	--Most Preferred to Check RowsUPD
	Remarks VARCHAR(MAX) NULL DEFAULT (''), --Errors will be Recorded If Any
	MergeQueryFromSourceToTarget VARCHAR(MAX) NULL,
	MergeQueryFromTargetToSource VARCHAR(MAX) NULL
);
--
DECLARE @TableColumns TABLE
(
	ColID INT NULL, --ORDINAL_POSITION
	ColumnName VARCHAR(128) NULL,
	ColumnDataType VARCHAR(64) NULL,
	IsPrimaryKeyCol BIT NULL,
	IsComputedCol BIT NULL,
	IsIdentityCol BIT NULL
);
--
DECLARE @TotalColumns INT, @TotalPKcols INT, @ExclusivePKcols INT, @ExclusiveIDcols INT, @IDasPKcols INT;
--
DECLARE @MatchColumns AS TABLE
(
	ColID INT NULL,
	ColumnName VARCHAR(128) NULL
);
--
DECLARE @SelColListV1S VARCHAR(MAX), @SelColListV1T VARCHAR(MAX), @SelColListV2 VARCHAR(MAX);
DECLARE @ON_MatchedColList VARCHAR(MAX), @WhereColList AS VARCHAR(MAX), @WHERE_UnMatchedColList VARCHAR(MAX);
DECLARE @UpdateColumnList VARCHAR(MAX);
DECLARE @InsertColumnList VARCHAR(MAX), @InsertValueList VARCHAR(MAX);
--$EndRegion: PreRequisites
--
--$BeginRegion: Cursor for Each Table
DECLARE @SCHname VARCHAR(128), @TBLname VARCHAR(128), @RowCount INT;
DECLARE TableCursor CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT SCHname, TBLname FROM @TableList;
OPEN TableCursor;
FETCH NEXT FROM TableCursor INTO @SCHname, @TBLname;
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
	BEGIN TRY
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @ErrMsg = NULL; --Reset Value
		IF @Debug = 1  PRINT '/*** Debug Print Comments For @Schema: "' + @SCHname + '" and @Table: "' + @TBLname + '" ***/' + CHAR(10);
		--
		INSERT INTO #COMPARISONTABLE (SchemaName, TableName) VALUES (@SCHname, @TBLname);
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Getting Table Columns In Detail w.r.to @SCHname and @TBLname
		DELETE @TableColumns WHERE 1 = 1; --Reset Table
		INSERT INTO @TableColumns(ColID, ColumnName, ColumnDataType, IsPrimaryKeyCol, IsComputedCol, IsIdentityCol)
		SELECT DISTINCT COL.column_id, COL.name, ISC.DATA_TYPE, ISNULL(PKC.Is_PK, 0), COL.is_computed, COL.is_identity
		FROM sys.columns AS COL
		INNER JOIN sys.tables AS TBL ON TBL.object_id = COL.object_id
		INNER JOIN sys.schemas AS SCH ON SCH.schema_id = TBL.schema_id
		INNER JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS AS ISC ON ISC.TABLE_SCHEMA = SCH.name AND ISC.TABLE_NAME = TBL.name AND ISC.COLUMN_NAME = COL.name
		LEFT JOIN (
					SELECT IC.object_id, IC.column_id, 1 AS "Is_PK"
					FROM sys.index_columns AS IC
					INNER JOIN sys.key_constraints AS KC ON IC.object_id = KC.parent_object_id AND IC.index_id = KC.unique_index_id AND KC.type = 'PK'
					) AS PKC ON PKC.column_id = COL.column_id AND PKC.object_id = COL.object_id
		WHERE SCH.name = @SCHname AND TBL.name = @TBLname
		ORDER BY COL.column_id ASC;
		--
		SELECT @TotalColumns = 0, @TotalPKcols = 0, @ExclusivePKcols = 0, @ExclusiveIDcols = 0, @IDasPKcols = 0; --Reset Values
		SELECT @TotalColumns = COUNT(*) FROM @TableColumns;
		SELECT @TotalPKcols = COUNT(*) FROM @TableColumns WHERE IsPrimaryKeyCol = 1;
		SELECT @ExclusivePKcols = COUNT(*) FROM @TableColumns WHERE IsPrimaryKeyCol = 1 AND IsIdentityCol= 0;
		SELECT @ExclusiveIDcols = COUNT(*) FROM @TableColumns WHERE IsPrimaryKeyCol = 0 AND IsIdentityCol = 1;
		SELECT @IDasPKcols = COUNT(*) FROM @TableColumns WHERE IsPrimaryKeyCol = 1 AND IsIdentityCol = 1;
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Exceptional Case Remarks
		UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE 
		SET Remarks = Remarks
			+ CASE
				WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols + @ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = @TotalColumns AND (@ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = 0 
					THEN '/** Table Contains All Columns as PrimaryKey Columns Only **/'
				WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols + @ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = @TotalColumns AND (@ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = 1 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 0 AND @IDasPKcols = 1
					THEN '/** Table Contains All Columns as PrimaryKey Columns in which One of the PrimaryKey Column is an IdentityKey Column **/'
				WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols + @ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = @TotalColumns AND (@ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = 1 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 1 AND @IDasPKcols = 0
					THEN '/** Table Contains All Columns with Both Exclusive PrimaryKey Columns and Exclusive IdentityKey Column **/'
				WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols = 0 AND @IDasPKcols = 0 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 0)
					THEN '/** Heap Table - DoesNot Contain Both PrimaryKey Columns and IdentityKey Column **/'
				ELSE '' END
		WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		--$EndRegion: Exceptional Case Remarks
		--
		IF @Debug = 1
		BEGIN
			SELECT @SCHname AS "@SCHname", @TBLname AS "@TBLname", TC.ColID, TC.ColumnName, TC.ColumnDataType, TC.IsPrimaryKeyCol, TC.IsComputedCol, TC.IsIdentityCol 
			FROM @TableColumns AS TC;
			--
			SELECT @SCHname AS "@SCHname", @TBLname AS "@TBLname", @TotalColumns AS "@TotalColumns", @TotalPKcols AS "@TotalPKcols", @ExclusivePKcols AS "@ExclusivePKcols", @ExclusiveIDcols AS "@ExclusiveIDcols", @IDasPKcols AS "@IDasPKcols",
			CASE WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols + @ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = @TotalColumns AND (@ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = 0 
					THEN '/** Table Contains All Columns as PrimaryKey Columns Only **/'
				 WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols + @ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = @TotalColumns AND (@ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = 1 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 0 AND @IDasPKcols = 1
					THEN '/** Table Contains All Columns as PrimaryKey Columns in which One of the PrimaryKey Column is an IdentityKey Column **/'
				 WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols + @ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = @TotalColumns AND (@ExclusiveIDcols + @IDasPKcols) = 1 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 1 AND @IDasPKcols = 0
					THEN '/** Table Contains All Columns with Both Exclusive PrimaryKey Columns and Exclusive IdentityKey Column **/'
				 WHEN (@ExclusivePKcols = 0 AND @IDasPKcols = 0 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 0)
					THEN '/** Heap Table - DoesNot Contain Both PrimaryKey Columns and IdentityKey Column **/'
				 ELSE '' END AS Remarks;
		END;
		--$EndRegion: Getting Table Columns In Detail w.r.to @SCHname and @TBLname
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Identifying Columns for ON - WHERE Conditions Clauses
		DELETE FROM @MatchColumns WHERE 1=1; --Reset Table
		IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM @TableColumns WHERE IsPrimaryKeyCol = 1 OR IsIdentityCol = 1)
		BEGIN
			INSERT INTO @MatchColumns (ColID, ColumnName)
			SELECT ColID, ColumnName FROM @TableColumns WHERE IsPrimaryKeyCol = 1 OR IsIdentityCol = 1;
		END;
		----$BeginRegion: Coalesce ON_MatchedColList
		SET @ON_MatchedColList = NULL; --Reset Value
		IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM @MatchColumns)
			BEGIN
				SELECT @ON_MatchedColList = COALESCE(@ON_MatchedColList + ' AND T.[' + ColumnName + '] = S.[' + ColumnName + ']', 'T.[' + ColumnName + '] = S.[' + ColumnName + ']')
				FROM @MatchColumns;
			END;
		ELSE
			SET @ON_MatchedColList = 'T.<TargetColumnName> = S.<SourceColumnName>';
		--
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--@ON_MatchedColList: ' + ISNULL(@ON_MatchedColList, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		----$EndRegion: Coalesce ON_MatchedColList
		--
		----$BeginRegion: Coalesce WHERE_UnMatchedColList
		SET @WHERE_UnMatchedColList = NULL; --Reset Value
		SELECT @WHERE_UnMatchedColList = COALESCE(@WHERE_UnMatchedColList +
			CASE
				WHEN ColumnDataType IN ('xml', 'text', 'uniqueidentifier', 'geography', 'hierarchyid')
					THEN ' OR ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), T.[' + ColumnName + '])COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, '''') != ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), S.[' + ColumnName + '])COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, '''')'
				WHEN ColumnDataType IN ('varbinary', 'decimal')
					THEN ' OR ISNULL(T.[' + ColumnName + '], 0) != ISNULL(S.[' + ColumnName + '], 0)'
				ELSE ' OR ISNULL(T.[' + ColumnName + '], '''') != ISNULL(S.[' + ColumnName + '], '''')' END,
			CASE
				WHEN ColumnDataType IN ('xml', 'text', 'uniqueidentifier', 'geography', 'hierarchyid')
					THEN 'ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), T.[' + ColumnName + '])COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, '''') != ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), S.[' + ColumnName + '])COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, '''')'
				WHEN ColumnDataType IN ('varbinary', 'decimal')
					THEN 'ISNULL(T.[' + ColumnName + '], 0) != ISNULL(S.[' + ColumnName + '], 0)'
				ELSE 'ISNULL(T.[' + ColumnName + '], '''') != ISNULL(S.[' + ColumnName + '], '''')' END)
		FROM @TableColumns
		WHERE ColumnName NOT IN ( SELECT ColumnName FROM @MatchColumns ) --Exclude PrimaryKey Columns and IdentityKey Column
			AND IsComputedCol <> 1 --Exclude Computed Columns
		ORDER BY ColID ASC;
		--
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--@WHERE_UnMatchedColList: ' + ISNULL(@WHERE_UnMatchedColList, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		----$EndRegion: Coalesce WHERE_UnMatchedColList
		--$EndRegion: Identifying Columns for ON - WHERE Conditions Clauses
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Getting Actual Manipulated Rows Count
		----$BeginRegion: SourceRowCount from @ReferSourceDatabase Table
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @RowCount = NULL; --Reset Value
		SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT @RowCountOUT = COUNT(*) FROM [' + @@SERVERNAME + '].[' + @ReferSourceDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '];';
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--SourceRowCount from @ReferSourceDatabase Table:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		BEGIN TRY
			EXECUTE sys.sp_executesql @Command = @SQLcmd, @Param = N'@RowCountOUT INT OUTPUT', @RowCountOUT = @RowCount OUTPUT;
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET SourceRowCount = @RowCount WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @ErrMsg = NULL; SET @ErrMsg = ERROR_MESSAGE(); --Reset Value
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET Remarks = @ErrMsg WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
			IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--* ' + @ErrMsg + CHAR(10);
		END CATCH;
		----$EndRegion: SourceRowCount from @ReferSourceDatabase Table
		--
		----$BeginRegion: TargetRowCount from @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @RowCount = NULL; --Reset Value
		SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT @RowCountOUT = COUNT(*) FROM [' + ISNULL(@LinkedServer, @@SERVERNAME) + '].[' + @CheckTargetDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '];';
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--TargetRowCount from @CheckTargetDatabase Table:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		BEGIN TRY
			EXECUTE sys.sp_executesql @Command = @SQLcmd, @Param = N'@RowCountOUT INT OUTPUT', @RowCountOUT = @RowCount OUTPUT;
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET TargetRowCount = @RowCount WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @ErrMsg = NULL; SET @ErrMsg = ERROR_MESSAGE();
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET Remarks = @ErrMsg WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
			IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--* ' + @ErrMsg + CHAR(10);
		END CATCH;
		----$EndRegion: TargetRowCount from @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		--
		SET @WhereColList = NULL; --Reset Value
		SELECT @WhereColList = COALESCE(@WhereColList + ' AND [' + ColumnName + '] IS NULL', '[' + ColumnName + '] IS NULL') FROM @MatchColumns;
		----$BeginRegion: Actual Rows Deleted From @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @RowCount = NULL; --Reset Value
		SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT @RowCountOUT = COUNT(*) FROM [' + @@SERVERNAME + '].[' + @ReferSourceDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS S' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'FULL OUTER JOIN [' + ISNULL(@LinkedServer, @@SERVERNAME) + '].[' + @CheckTargetDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS T' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'	ON ' + @ON_MatchedColList + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'WHERE ' + REPLACE(@WhereColList, '[', 'T.[') + ';';
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--Actual Rows Deleted From @CheckTargetDatabase Table:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		BEGIN TRY
			EXECUTE sys.sp_executesql @Command = @SQLcmd, @Param = N'@RowCountOUT INT OUTPUT', @RowCountOUT = @RowCount OUTPUT;
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET RowsDEL = @RowCount WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @ErrMsg = NULL; SET @ErrMsg = ERROR_MESSAGE(); --Reset Value
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET Remarks = @ErrMsg WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
			IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--* ' + @ErrMsg + CHAR(10);
		END CATCH;
		----$EndRegion: Actual Rows Deleted From @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		--
		----$BeginRegion: Actual Rows Inserted Into @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @RowCount = NULL; --Reset Value
		SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT @RowCountOUT = COUNT(*) FROM [' + @@SERVERNAME + '].[' + @ReferSourceDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS S' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'FULL OUTER JOIN [' + ISNULL(@LinkedServer, @@SERVERNAME) + '].[' + @CheckTargetDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS T' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'	ON ' + @ON_MatchedColList + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'WHERE ' + REPLACE(@WhereColList, '[', 'S.[') + ';';
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--Actual Rows Inserted Into @CheckTargetDatabase Table:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		BEGIN TRY
			EXECUTE sys.sp_executesql @Command = @SQLcmd, @Param = N'@RowCountOUT INT OUTPUT', @RowCountOUT = @RowCount OUTPUT;
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET RowsINS = @RowCount WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @ErrMsg = NULL; SET @ErrMsg = ERROR_MESSAGE(); --Reset Value
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET Remarks = @ErrMsg WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
			IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--* ' + @ErrMsg + CHAR(10);
		END CATCH;
		----$EndRegion: Actual Rows Inserted Into @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		--
		----$BeginRegion: Actual Rows Updated In @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @RowCount = NULL; --Reset Value
		SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT @RowCountOUT = COUNT(*) FROM [' + @@SERVERNAME + '].[' + @ReferSourceDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS S ' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'INNER JOIN [' + ISNULL(@LinkedServer, @@SERVERNAME) + '].[' + @CheckTargetDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS T ' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'	ON ' + @ON_MatchedColList + ' ' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'WHERE ' + @WHERE_UnMatchedColList + ';';
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--Actual Rows Updated In @CheckTargetDatabase Table:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		BEGIN TRY
			EXECUTE sys.sp_executesql @Command = @SQLcmd, @Param = N'@RowCountOUT INT OUTPUT', @RowCountOUT = @RowCount OUTPUT;
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET RowsUPD = @RowCount WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @ErrMsg = NULL; SET @ErrMsg = ERROR_MESSAGE(); --Reset Value
			IF (@ExclusivePKcols = 0 AND @IDasPKcols = 0 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 0) --Exclusing Heap Tables
				SET @ErrMsg = '/** Heap Table - DoesNot Contain Both PrimaryKey Columns and IdentityKey Column **/';
			UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET Remarks = @ErrMsg WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
			IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--* ' + @ErrMsg + CHAR(10);
			IF (@ExclusivePKcols = 0 AND @IDasPKcols = 0 AND @ExclusiveIDcols = 0) SET @ErrMsg = NULL; --Reset @ErrMsg to Generate Statements for Heap Tables
		END CATCH;
		----$EndRegion: Actual Rows Updated In @CheckTargetDatabase Table
		--$EndRegion: Getting Actual Manipulated Rows Count
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Generating ValidateQueries V1 and V2
		IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM #COMPARISONTABLE WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname AND Remarks LIKE 'Invalid object name%' )
		BEGIN
		----$BeginRegion: Generating ValidateQuery V1 w.r.to @SCH and @TBL
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @SelColListV1S = NULL; SET @SelColListV1T = NULL; --Reset Value
		SELECT	@SelColListV1S = COALESCE(@SelColListV1S + ', S.[' + ColumnName + ']', 'S.[' + ColumnName + ']'),
				@SelColListV1T = COALESCE(@SelColListV1T + ', T.[' + ColumnName + ']', 'T.[' + ColumnName + ']')
		FROM @TableColumns
		ORDER BY ColID ASC;
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--@SelColListV1S: ' + @SelColListV1S + CHAR(10) + '--@SelColListV1T: ' + @SelColListV1T + CHAR(10);
		--
		SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT ''' + @SCHname + '.' + @TBLname + ''' AS "TableName", ' + @SelColListV1S + ', ' + '''|'' AS "O", ' + @SelColListV1T + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'FROM [' + @@SERVERNAME + '].[' + @ReferSourceDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS S ' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'FULL OUTER JOIN [' + ISNULL(@LinkedServer, @@SERVERNAME) + '].[' + @CheckTargetDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS T ' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'	ON ' + @ON_MatchedColList + CHAR(10)--
					+ CASE WHEN @WHERE_UnMatchedColList IS NOT NULL THEN N'WHERE /*1 = 1 OR*/ ' + @WHERE_UnMatchedColList ELSE '' END + ';';
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--ValidateQuery V1 w.r.to @SCH and @TBL:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET ValidateQueryV1 = @SQLcmd WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		----$EndRegion: Generating ValidateQuery V1 w.r.to @SCH and @TBL
		--
		----$BeginRegion: Generating ValidateQuery V2 w.r.to @SCH and @TBL
		SET @SQLcmd = NULL; SET @SelColListV2 = NULL; --Reset Value
		SELECT @SelColListV2 = COALESCE(@SelColListV2 + ', S.[' + ColumnName + '], T.[' + ColumnName + ']', 'S.[' + ColumnName + '], T.[' + ColumnName + ']')
		FROM @TableColumns
		ORDER BY ColID ASC;
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--@SelColListV2: ' + @SelColListV2 + CHAR(10);
		--
		SET @SQLcmd = N'SELECT ''' + @SCHname + '.' + @TBLname + ''' AS "TableName", ' + @SelColListV2 + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'FROM [' + @@SERVERNAME + '].[' + @ReferSourceDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS S ' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'FULL OUTER JOIN [' + ISNULL(@LinkedServer, @@SERVERNAME) + '].[' + @CheckTargetDatabase + '].[' + @SCHname + '].[' + @TBLname + '] AS T ' + CHAR(10)--
					+ N'	ON ' + @ON_MatchedColList + CHAR(10)--
					+ CASE WHEN @WHERE_UnMatchedColList IS NOT NULL THEN N'WHERE /*1 = 1 OR*/ ' + @WHERE_UnMatchedColList ELSE '' END + ';';
		IF @Debug = 1 PRINT '--ValidateQuery V2 w.r.to @SCH and @TBL:' + CHAR(10) + ISNULL(@SQLcmd, 'NULL') + CHAR(10);
		UPDATE #COMPARISONTABLE SET ValidateQueryV2 = @SQLcmd WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname;
		----$EndRegion: Generating ValidateQuery V2 w.r.to @SCH and @TBL
		END;
		--$EndRegion: Generating ValidateQueries V1 and V2
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Generating Merge Statements For Objects (Do Not have @ErrMsg) AND (Not Invalid Object)
		IF @ErrMsg IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM #COMPARISONTABLE WHERE SchemaName = @SCHname AND TableName = @TBLname AND Remarks LIKE 'Invalid object name%' )
		BEGIN
		----$BeginRegion: Coalesce @UpdateColumnList
		SET @UpdateColumnList = NULL; --Reset Value
		SELECT @UpdateColumnList = COALESCE(@UpdateColumnList +
